text: We'll hear arguments next in 479, Edmonds against Compagnie Generale Transatlantique.
Mr. Chief Justice, may it please the Court.
Mr. Chief Justice, may it please the Court.
One very brief comment, I realize it is beyond the normal time for the Court.
What do have to say about whether this case might be back here could conceivably be back here after the District Court acts?

If the Court rules that the longshoreman is entitled to his common-law remedy of 100% recovery from the shipowner which we have espouse and which the other circuits have held then no one will ever be back here because he will be required to repay his lien to the stevedore and receive a credit against future compensation which may be payable.
